name: AirBnB Guest Handbook
description: Share this all-inclusive handbook with your guests.Features Answer common queries just once Share with guests on booking Update whenever you want and share the same link Contacts, location, and house rules Check-in and Checkout Procedure Getting to the house Instructions for stay (cleaning, laundry, heating, etc) Guide to restaurants, tourist spots, and more What's Included Link to the notion template Video walkthrough of how to customize template FAQsWhat if my guest doesn't use notion?By publi
features: Answer common queries just once; Share with guests on booking; Update whenever you want and share the same link; Contacts, location, and house rules; Check-in and Checkout Procedure; Getting to the house; Instructions for stay (cleaning, laundry, heating, etc); Guide to restaurants, tourist spots, and more; Link to the notion template; Video walkthrough of how to customize template
